![Tonifying Decoction .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/ba/Tonifying_Decoction_.jpg)| Evil Repelling Medicament | Uncommon | Formula | Formula bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain from Lan-Li-Guhh-Baw"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts "Flame Ore," an uncommon ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the surrounding text, Flame Ore can be obtained by defeating Flamlings in the Flaming Mountains or purchased from the Shrine Store. It serves as a collectible resource within the game's crafting or item system.
